column1: Appendix Table 13. Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction, by sex, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2010
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Author(s): Paul Guerino, Paige M. Harrison, and William J. Sabol
Appendix Table 13. Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction, by sex, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2010

Note: Data source used to estimate race and Hispanic origin changed in 2010. Use caution when comparing to prior years. Counts based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. See Methodology for estimation method.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, other Pacific Islanders, and persons identifying two or more races.
b/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin.

Sources: BJS, National Prisoner Statistics Program, Federal Justice Statistics Program, National Corrections Reporting Program, Survey of Inmates in State and Local Correctional Facilities, and National Inmate Survey.
